estate_title: Modern Single-Family Home with Mountain Views
description: Experience luxury living in this modern single-family home featuring breathtaking mountain views. Ideal for families seeking comfort and tranquility.
Discover charm and character in this historic townhouse located in a vibrant neighborhood. Perfect for those who appreciate urban living with a touch of nostalgia.

estate_title: Luxurious Apartment with City Skyline Views
description: Indulge in urban luxury in this spacious apartment boasting panoramic views of the city skyline. Perfect for professionals seeking sophistication and convenience.

description: Live and study in style in this modern student housing complex conveniently located near the university campus. Enjoy amenities designed for student life.

estate_title: Senior Living Community with Resort Amenities
description: Experience retirement in paradise in this senior living community offering resort-style amenities and a vibrant social atmosphere. Live life to the fullest.

estate_title: Seaside Vacation Rental with Private Beach Access
description: Escape to paradise in this seaside vacation rental offering direct access to a private beach. Relax and rejuvenate amidst stunning ocean views.
